item.title: Brandon Harvey, Los Angeles, CA
item.description: magnopus :: product engineering As a Director of Engineering for Product at Magnopus (2020-present), I’ve built the US side of the companyâ€™s first product engineering team, both organically and by hiring. Starting in the middle of the pandemic, we’ve created an effective new software delivery organization nearly from scratch, not just by applying best practices in engineering, but by creating interdisciplinary workflows across product, design, interaction prototyping, and QA.
